transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Dinesh sir irukangala?
Executive: Oor level. Hello.
Customer: Dinesh sir irukangala? Naa Dinesh oda manager Krishna pesuren maam. Eppidi irukinga?
Customer: Aa nalla iruken sir. Neenga eppidi sir irukinga?
Executive: Nalla iruken maam. Nalla iruken maam. Krishna pesuren. Nyaabagam irukka?
Customer: Aa nyaabagam irukku sir. Sir ippo IndiaMart la leads illa sir. Adhaan sir call pannen.
Executive: Adhu yenna pathi koopttukalaame maam neenga.
Customer: Puriyala. Number irukku. Yen number ke koopttukalaame.
Customer: Illa avanga dhaane maam andha call pannuvanga. Adhaan vichaarichu irukken.
Executive: Ennamo puriyala.
Executive: Dinesh koopttanu solreenga appo.
Customer: Aa.
Executive: Neenga customer care koopttu irukinga.
Customer: Oh sorry sir. Complaint complaint raise aayidichu. Adhanaala ketten.
Customer: Oh okay okay sir. Avangala number once solreengala? Naa whatsapp pannitta avangalukku. Oru second line la irunga. Ippo enna maam issue? Buyleads varlaya?
Customer: Aa aama sir.
Executive: Okay. Ippo enna edutha varaikum eppidi irukku feedback actually?
Customer: Aa sir low price aah dhaan vandhuttu irukku. Naanga konjam oru 50,000 thukku mela edhir paarkkurom. Aduthula Tamilnattukkulla leads avalaava illa. Near by states ne paathalume illa sir. Other brand aah dhaan irukku.
Executive: Vera brand aah is kekkuraanga solreengala?
Customer: Aa aama sir.
Executive: Oru nimisham line la irunga.
Executive: Last time namma products la add pannom la maam?
Customer: Aama sir. Adhukku appuram thirumba thirumba add pannirukkom.
Executive: Paathu paarthen. Oru nimisham adha open pannittu irukken. Ippo enquiries ellaam enna feedback maam ippo? Leads enquiries me vandhu paatheenga na average aah nammalukku almost oru maasathukku.
Executive: Indha indha month mattum 70 enquiries vandhu irukku. Last month 68. Indha month vandhu 70 enquiries vandhu irukku. Idhula irundhu feedback enna solraanga maam neenga?
Customer: Sir idhula vandhu oru rendu enquiry nalla poittu irukku. Okay. Aana wait panna sollittaanga. One month kitta aagum appidinnu sollittu. Michi ellaame enna na price kettuittu appillaitta other brand dhaan. Fast brand dhaan kekkuraanga. Okay other brand dhaan kekkuraanga. Okay.
Customer: Aa aama sir.
Executive: Oh ippo other brand kekkura customer kitta namma convince panni namma brand edukka vachiralaam. Appuram namma service nalla irukkum. Product nalla irukkumnu solli correct aah?
Customer: Adhellaam sollitten sir. Avanga enna solraanganna naa pudhusa oru brand use panradhukku already use panra brand eh enakku okay dhaan. Ratio best eh varala.
Executive: Sorry sorry sollunga.
Customer: Adhaan sir ratio vandhu correct aah varumaannu theriyala. Aana naa vandhu regular aah use panradhu indha brand dhaan use panren. Enakku idhu dhaan venum. Pudhusa vandhu oru brand kku vandhu naa eppidi use panradhukku appidinnu solli solraanga. Naa vandhu face eh paathalume paathile thappu pannittu irukken solraanga.
Executive: Okay. Uh huh.
Executive: Purinjidhu. Adhaan sir. Enakku enna doubt appidinnna for example ippo customer kitta neenga oru sila customer laam neenga pesiye poi correct aah? Hmm. Adhula oru sila buyleads ellaam vandhu relevant aah irukkum la. See idhu namakku okay positive aah irukku appidinnu solli.
Customer: Aama. Andha maari buyleads laam neenga vandhu highlight panni vachukkonga. Highlight panni vachittu enna panreenganna andha buylead oda product name irukkum la. Aama. Andha buylead product name le vachi neenga enna panreenganna indha udan eh adhe name la buylead search pannunga. Yenna adhu irundhu relevant aah irukku correct aah?
Customer: Correct dhaan sir. Ippo naanga freeze dryer indha indha month fullaave engaloda idha eduthu paarungalaam. Freeze dryer dhaan nariya eduthu iruppom. Yenna freeze dryer vandhu freeze dryer vandhu positive aah engalukku irundhuchu starting la. Naan innum freeze dryer. Ippo ennaanna freeze dryer dhaan vandhuttu irukku. Adhukku ippo buyeconomics ippo innonnu. Naanga adhe vandhu indha week la moonu lead dhaan eduthom. Adhe dhaan thirumba thirumba vandhuttu irundhuchu. Freeze dryer buyeconomics. Adha thavirthu vera edhaavadhu leads varattumaannu kettaa illa.
Executive: Varala okay. Irunga namma account idhu IndiaMart open panren.
Executive: Ippo leads naanga idhume namma pan India fulla namma panrom correct aah?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Ippo Andhra la irundhu vandhu irukku paarungamaam freeze dryer ellaam kettu irukkaanga.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ippo live la irukku paarunga.
Customer: Oru nimisham sir.
Executive: Illa varlaya sir?
Executive: Ungalukku kaamikidhu. Oru nimisham irunga.
Executive: Andha 93451 adhaan unga whatsapp number? 936637?
Customer: Enna sir?
Executive: 93657 adhaan unga whatsapp number?
Customer: Aama aama 9363751.
Executive: Dinesh number whatsapp pannirukku paarunga ungalukku.
Customer: Aa seri okay sir. Sir maam ippo naa ungalukku kitta call panni pesuren sir. Hmm. Enna doubt neenga Dinesh kku koopdunga yenakkum neenga koopdalaam. Yenna idhukku kooptteenga na first no idea team kku pogum. Adhukku appuram dhaan varum adhu. First namma le pesi discuss pannikkalaame correct aah?
Customer: Aa okay sir.
Executive: Okay. Seri naa koopda solren ippo. Aa okay sir. Okay sir thank you. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Few leads, mostly low price.

- Not many leads within Tamil Nadu.

- Leads are for other brands.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested highlighting relevant buyleads.

- Executive shared freeze dryer leads from Andhra Pradesh.

- Executive shared Dinesh's WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will ask Dinesh to call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product, enquiries
